law.catch_line: In this section, "zero-emission vehicle" means any vehicle that:...

text.section:
In this section, "zero-emission vehicle" means any vehicle that:
Is determined by the Secretary to be of a type that does not produce any tailpipe or evaporative emissions; and
Has not been altered from the manufacturer's original specifications.
A zero-emission vehicle is exempt from the mandatory tests and inspections required by this subtitle.

The Administration and the Secretary shall adopt regulations necessary to:
Provide for the determination of which vehicles are zero-emission vehicles; and
Implement the provisions of this section.
